title: Luv keeb kwm ntawm Art nyob rau hauv Space - Orbital Tuam Tsev
heading: Luv keeb kwm ntawm Art nyob rau hauv qhov chaw
intro: Puas tau txij li thawj zaug kev ua tiav ntawm kev tsim hluav taws xob satellite hauv xyoo 1957 , ntau tshaj kaum txhiab satellites tau tuaj rau lub ntiaj teb. Nyob rau hauv lub sijhawm tshiab no, cov kws ua yeeb yam tau pom ib txoj hauv kev nthuav dav lawv cov kev coj ua thiab qhov chaw sab nrauv tau dhau los ua cov ntaub ntawv tshiab. Nrog rau qhov ntawd, cov lus nug tseem ceeb txog kev nom kev tswv ntawm kev tshawb nrhiav chaw tau tshwm sim - txawm hais tias muaj ntau qhov av tseem tsis tau them.

leonov.text: Thawj artwork tsim nyob rau hauv qhov chaw yog ib tug kos duab ntawm lub hnub sawv ntawm lub ntiaj teb, ua los ntawm Lavxias teb sab astronaut Alexei Leonov thaum lub sij hawm nyob rau hauv lub nkoj ntawm lub Voskhod 2 nyob rau hauv 1965 .
leonov.caption: Thawj daim duab tsim nyob rau hauv qhov chaw, thiab cov xaum Alexei Leonov siv los kos nws. Yees duab: Tsev khaws puav pheej ntawm Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Peb xyoos tom qab ntawd, Moon Tsev khaws puav pheej , ib lub phaj me me uas tau nqis los ntawm lub hli nrog cov ntawv sau los ntawm rau ntawm cov kws ua yeeb yam tseem ceeb tshaj plaws hauv Asmeskas thaum lub sijhawm: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers thiab Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Duab ntawm Moon Tsev khaws puav pheej los ntawm thawj New York Times tsab xov xwm. Tus ntiv tes xoo obscures Warhol daim duab.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Warhol qhov kev txhawb nqa kev txhawb nqa - sab laug sab laug - ua rau txoj haujlwm no nyuaj rau kev sib txuas lus xov xwm thaum lub sijhawm.
moonMuseum.caption2: Daim duab New York Times tau xaiv los luam tawm, nrog rau cov duab kos pom hauv qab no thiab Andy Warhol cov duab kos nyob rau sab saum toj sab laug.

fallenAstronaut.text: Nyob rau hauv 1971 , ib tug me me scale humanoid txhuas sculpture hu ua Fallen Astronaut tau muab tso rau lub hli los ntawm Apollo 15 astronaut David Scott . Tus kws kos duab Belgian Paul Van Hoeydonck npaj, nrog rau daim ntawv no, ua kev nco txog cov astronauts thiab cosmonauts uas tau tuag hauv kev nce qib ntawm kev tshawb nrhiav chaw.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Saib ntawm kev ua koob tsheej nco txog lub hli ntawm Hadley-Apennine qhov chaw tsaws.

pioneerVoyager.text: Hauv xyoo 1970 , ob qho tib si Pioneer Plaques thiab Voyager Probes tau teeb tsa lub qab ntug tshiab rau kev kos duab hauv qhov chaw. Nqa kub-anodized aluminium plaques nrog cov lus pom los ntawm lub ntiaj teb mus rau lwm tus neeg caij tsheb uas yuav pom nws nyob rau yav tom ntej, lawv tau piav qhia tib neeg lub neej hauv nws cov ntsiab lus tseem ceeb tshaj plaws.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 thiab 11 plaques, nqa mus rau qhov chaw sib sib zog nqus hauv xyoo 1970s.

dove.text: Xyoo 1990 , Brazil tau tso nws lub cim rau ntawm thaj chaw no nrog DOVE / OSCAR-17 , ib qho kev ua haujlwm zoo tshaj plaws ntawm lub zog poetic. Txawm hais tias nws tus tsim tsis tau xav txog nws tus kheej yog ib tus kws kos duab, nws yog qhov kev ua siab zoo: nws tau sau cov menyuam yaus lub suab thov kom muaj kev thaj yeeb nyab xeeb thiab xa lawv mus rau ntau tshaj li ob txhiab tus kws tshaj lij xov tooj cua thoob ntiaj teb, hloov pauv tus pioneering CubeSat rau hauv kev ua suab paj nruag.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, Brazil tus poetic satellite xa me nyuam lub suab rau kev thaj yeeb, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Hauv xyoo 2012 , tus kws kos duab Trevor Paglen tau tsim "Cov Duab Kawg" , lub micro-etched disc uas muaj 100 daim duab txuas nrog Echostar XVI kev sib txuas lus satellite hauv geostationary orbit. Tsim los kom dhau ntau txhiab xyoo, nws yog txhais tau tias kom muaj kev vam meej ntawm tib neeg los ua ib qho khoom qub qub rau yav tom ntej.
lastPictures.caption: Cov Duab Kawg, lub micro-etched disc tsim los ua kom tib neeg muaj sia nyob, tau tsim tawm xyoo 2012.

ulises.text: Hauv xyoo 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) tau tsim Ulises I , nanosatellite xeeb los ua lub tswv yim ua yeeb yam raws li kev coj ntawm tus kws kos duab Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Lub satellite tau nqa mus rau lub stratosphere ntawm lub zais pa thaum lub sij hawm Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Tsim kom tawg ntawm kwv yees li plaub teev thiab nqis los ntawm parachute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, lub tswv yim satellite opera los ntawm Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Nws tsis yog kom txog rau thaum 2014 uas thawj tus neeg ua yeeb yam zoo nkauj tau tshaj tawm. Lub Tsev Kawm Ntawv Qib Siab Tokyo's ARTSAT-1 Invader project xa cov ntaub ntawv spatial rau lub ntiaj teb uas tau siv hauv kev kos duab thiab tsim suab paj nruag.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader lub moj khaum thiab cov khoom seem uas tseem nyob hauv ntiaj teb.
artsat.caption2: Lub hom phiaj [SPACE x ART] - dhau ntawm Cosmologies exhibition nyob rau ntawm Tsev khaws puav pheej ntawm Kev Kawm Txuj Ci Tokyo

kac.text: Brazilian thiab Asmeskas cov kws kos duab niaj hnub Eduardo Kac tau pab txhawb rau qhov chaw kos duab los ntawm kev koom tes nrog NASA thiab SpaceX . Nws "Inner Telescope" ( 2017 ), tsim nrog Fabkis tus kws tshawb fawb Thomas Pesquet , ua rau cov duab puab ua nyob rau hauv Chaw Nres Nkoj Thoob Ntiaj Teb .
kac.caption: Sab hauv Telescope ntawm Chaw Nres Nkoj Thoob Ntiaj Teb, tsim nrog Fabkis tus kws tshawb fawb Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: Nyob rau hauv 2018 , ib tug passive CubeSat ua raws li ib tug kos duab project twb launched rau hauv orbit. Tsim los ntawm bahamian conceptual artist Tavares Strachan , Enoch muaj 24-karat-kub canopic hub nrog lub bust ntawm thawj African-Asmeskas astronaut, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (display unit), 2015-2017. ⓒ Tavares Strachan, yees duab ⓒ Tsev khaws puav pheej Associates/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Nyob rau hauv tib lub xyoo, Trevor Paglen's Orbital Reflector kuj tau tsim los ua cov duab puab nyob hauv lub CubeSat tsis ua haujlwm. Cov hauj lwm yog ib qho kev kos duab taw qhia los hloov txoj hauv kev uas peb pom peb qhov chaw hauv ntiaj teb. Nws tsis tau siv kom raug. Txawm hais tias nws tsis tau qhib raws li tsim los, nws ua rau muaj kev sib tham tseem ceeb thiab kos cov lus teb zoo siab los ntawm cov kws tshawb fawb, cov kws tshawb fawb, cov chaw tshaj xov xwm, cov kws qhia ntawv, cov tub ntxhais kawm, thiab cov pej xeem thoob ntiaj teb, qhia tias kev ua yeeb yam zoo yuav tsum tsis muaj kev vam meej.
orbitalReflector.caption: Digital Rendering ntawm Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Ntau lwm cov kws ua yeeb yam tau pab txhawb rau thaj chaw kos duab, txhua tus coj cov kev xav tshwj xeeb hauv lawv txoj kev tshawb fawb. Cov haujlwm tseem ceeb suav nrog Sarah Jane Pell cov kws tshawb fawb astronaut artist tshawb nrhiav tib neeg kev ua tau zoo hauv ib puag ncig huab; Agnes Meyer-Brandis's Moon Goose Analogue project tshuaj xyuas keeb kwm thiab niaj hnub tshawb nrhiav chaw piav qhia; Nahum's AstroArts kev pab cuam pab txhawb kev ua yeeb yam microgravity thwmsim; thiab Arthur Woods's Cosmic Dancer duab puab, thawj cov duab puab tau nthuav tawm hauv qhov chaw nyob hauv Mir chaw nres tsheb hauv 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Xyoo 2025 , tom qab 4 xyoo ntawm kev tshawb fawb thiab kev loj hlob, Brazilian artist Edson Pavoni thiab pab pawg neeg koom tes sib koom ua ke yuav tso lub Tuam Tsev Orbital , ib qho kev koom tes kos duab satellite uas caw txhua tus neeg hauv ntiaj teb kom xa cov npe mus rau orbit, tsim kom muaj kev nco txog ntau dhau ntawm ciam teb.
orbitalTemple.caption: Lub Tuam Tsev Orbital ntawm Mercosul Bienal. Yees duab: Clara Marques
